testcase.name: create a camapign in GEMA
testcase.system-out: Given user enters valid gema user name and password.........................passed When fill all the required gema campaign creation form......................passed And click on create a campaign..............................................passed Then new campaign created successfully......................................passed When user clicks on logout..................................................passed Then user should be logged out from application.............................passed
